author: Special Correspondent
text: The DMK on Tuesday allotted one seat each to Samooga Samathuvapadai Katchi led by former IAS officer P. Sivakami, Perunthalaivar Kamaraj Makkal Katchi of N.R. Dhanapalan and Vivasaya Thozhilalar Katchi of Pon. Kumar. A release from the DMK said the candidates of these parties would contest on DMK’s Rising Sun symbol.
title: Sivakami gets one seat in DMK alliance
